Reviews.Title: OMG!
Reviews.Author: New Dawning Solutions
Reviews.Content: i thought i hit the JackPot when i was having soooo much fun taking all of the items out of the box it was delivered in, just doing that alone is enough to super excite anyone!  Everything is compatible and the pictures are awesome!

Reviews.Title: I love the day i Bought
Reviews.Author: montusingh
Reviews.Content: its light in weightFast oughtCan b used Auto or ManualPrice is vary goodLove the dealGood
